title: Criticism of the Bible - Collection 28
description:
Criticism of the Bible - Collection 28:

We have 24 titles in this upload:

-  Albrektson - Text, Translation, Theology; Selected Essays on the Hebrew Bible (2010)

-  Anderson et al (Eds.) - New Approaches to the Study of Biblical Interpretation in Judaism of the Second Temple Period .. (2013)

-  Bauks et al (Eds.) - Between Text and Text; the Hermeneutics of Intertextuality in Ancient Cultures and Their Afterlife  .. (2012)

-  Bynum - The Fourth Gospel and the Scriptures; Illuminating the Forum and Meaning of Scriptural Citation in John 19,37 (2012)

-  Cabal (Ed.) - The Apologetics Study Bible (2007)

-  Ehrman & Plese (Eds.) - The Other Gospels; Accounts of Jesus from Outside the New Testament (2014)

-  Finkelstein & Silberman - David and Solomon; In Search of the Bible's Sacred Kings and the Roots of the Western Tradition (2007)

-  Foster - The Gospel of Peter; Introduction, Critical Edition and Commentary (2010)

-  Hanneken - The Subversion of the Apocalypses in the Book of Jubilees (2012)

-  Hempel - The Damascus Texts (2000)

-  Koet, Moyise & Verheyden (Eds.) - The Scriptures of Israel in Jewish and Christian Tradition (2013)

-  Lamb (Ed.) - The Catena in Marcum; a Byzantine Anthology of Early Commentary on Mark (2012)

-  Le Donne & Thatcher (Eds.) - The Fourth Gospel in First-Century Media Culture (2011)

-  Lee - The Erosion of Biblical Certainty; Battles Over Authority and Interpretation in America (2013)

-  Levine & Brettler (Eds.) - The Jewish Annotated New Testament (2011)

-  Meyer & Robinson - The Nag Hammadi Scriptures (2007)

-  Murphy - Pseudo-Philo; Rewriting the Bible (1993)

-  O'Hare - Have You Seen, Son of Man; a Study in the Translation and Vorlage of LXX Ezekiel 40-48 (2010)

-  Porter & Schnabel (Eds.) - On the Writing of New Testament Commentaries (2013)

-  Rey (Ed.) - The Dead Sea Scrolls and Pauline Literature (2014)

-  Saulnier - Calendrical Variations in Second Temple Judaism; New Perspectives on the Date of the Last Supper Debate (2012)

-  Sommer (Ed.) - Jewish Concepts of Scripture; a Comparative Introduction (2012)

-  Thomas - The Acts of Peter, Gospel Literature, and the Ancient Novel; Rewriting the Past (2003)

-  van Peursen - Language and Interpretation in the Syriac Text of Ben Sira; a Comparative Linguistic and Literary Study (2007)
